price: 70. Kai jis sakė savo tėvui ir savo žmonėms: „Ką jūs garbinate?“
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā taʿbudūna
